basics.name: Danny Weng
basics.summary: Computer Science.  Graduate student.  That's about it.

education.institution: University of Hawaii at Manoa, Honolulu, HI
University of Hawaii at Manoa, Honolulu, HI

work.summary: TA for the following ICS courses: 415, 475, 111, 314 (Current).
Responsible for computer repairs, troubleshooting, and outside technical support.
highlights: Provide warranty repair for Lenovo machines
Provide repairs for personal computer-related issues
Provide administrative and network services for companies

work.company: William S. Richardson School of Law
work.summary: Provide technical support for the law school.
highlights: Assist student and professors with a wide-range of technical issues
Set up A/V equipment for lectures and law school events
Maintain A/V equipment and computer lab

work.summary: Assisted with PI in laboratory work.
highlights: Performed lab tasks such as gel electrophoresis, PCR, and nanodrops
Utilized software including Geneious, BLAST, and Stata to process and analyze biological data

volunteer.summary: Participated in events which include guided hikes, snorkeling, and fundraising activities.  Also participated in volunteer events, including beach clean-ups, The Great Aloha Run, Relay For Life, Kaupa Adopt a Stream Project, and Waimea Audobon Conservation Project.
Participated in events which raises awareness of marine life around the islands, including whale monitoring, beach clean-ups, and laboratory tours.
